name: Blade Mastery
description: Enhanced swordsmanship skills.
upgrades: Improved precision and speed.

name: Slime Transformation
description: Ability to turn into a shape-shifting slime.
upgrades: Gain resistance to various elements.

name: Spider Silk Manipulation
description: Control over spider silk for traps and mobility.
upgrades: Create stronger silk and camouflage.

name: Teleportation
description: Instantaneous travel between locations.
upgrades: Longer distance jumps and group teleportation.
downsides: Drain on stamina with frequent use.

name: Time Manipulation
description: Control over time, allowing for time freezes or fast-forwards.
upgrades: Precise control and time-travel abilities.

name: Mana Absorption
description: Ability to absorb mana from the environment or enemies.
upgrades: Greater absorption rates and mana conversion.

name: Animal Taming
description: Ability to communicate with and tame animals.
upgrades: Tame mythical creatures and control larger groups.

name: Elemental Affinity (Fire)
description: Mastery over fire-based spells and attacks.
upgrades: Control more advanced fire elements.

name: Dungeon Mapping
description: Detailed map creation of uncharted dungeons.
upgrades: Real-time updates and hidden trap detection.

name: Stealth Invisibility
description: Invisibility and near-silent movement.
upgrades: Longer duration and reduced detection risk.

name: Reincarnation Knowledge
description: Retain knowledge from past lives.
upgrades: Recall past skills and experiences.

name: Alchemy Mastery
description: Ability to transmute and create powerful potions.
upgrades: Brew rare elixirs and poisons.

name: Astral Projection
description: Project your consciousness to explore the astral plane.
upgrades: Travel between worlds and gather information.

name: Healing Touch
description: Instantly heal wounds with a touch.
upgrades: Cure diseases and ailments.

name: Demon Contract
description: Form pacts with demons for power.
upgrades: Gain unique demon abilities.

name: Beast Transformation
description: Transform into a powerful beast form.
upgrades: Greater strength and new transformations.

name: Soul Manipulation
description: Control over souls, including extraction and manipulation.
upgrades: Resurrect the dead or trap souls for power.

name: Dimensional Pocket
description: Store items in a personal pocket dimension.
upgrades: Increase storage capacity and accessibility.

name: Illusion Casting
description: Create convincing illusions.
upgrades: Complex and lasting illusions.

name: Enhanced Crafting
description: Craft powerful weapons and items.
upgrades: Create legendary artifacts.

name: Charm Magic
description: Enchant and manipulate the emotions of others.
upgrades: Control over stronger emotions.

name: Gravity Manipulation
description: Control over gravitational forces.
upgrades: Alter gravity's strength and direction.

name: Golem Creation
description: Craft and control powerful golems.
upgrades: Create larger and more intricate golems.

name: Elemental Affinity (Water)
description: Mastery over water-based spells and attacks.
upgrades: Control more advanced water elements.

name: Divination
description: See glimpses of the future.
upgrades: Increased accuracy and vision of distant events.

name: Shadow Manipulation
description: Control over shadows for stealth and attacks.
upgrades: Manifest shadowy creatures and darkness.

name: Dimensional Travel
description: Travel between parallel dimensions.
upgrades: Navigate specific dimensions and control dimensional rifts.

name: Soulbound Weapon
description: Form a bond with a powerful, sentient weapon.
upgrades: Unlock new weapon abilities and forms.
downsides: Weapon's personality can clash with the user's.

name: Necromancy
description: Raise and control the undead.
upgrades: Command more powerful undead and retain their abilities.

name: Gravity Well
description: Create localized gravitational anomalies.
upgrades: Manipulate gravity on a larger scale.

name: Berserker Rage
description: Enter a frenzied state of heightened strength and aggression.
upgrades: Longer duration and enhanced physical abilities.

name: Weather Manipulation
description: Control over weather patterns.
upgrades: Summon storms, blizzards, and other extreme weather.

name: Phantom Senses
description: Enhanced sensory perception, including seeing spirits.
upgrades: Detect hidden entities and sense danger.

name: Sword of Light
description: Summon a radiant sword with holy powers.
upgrades: Increase the sword's size and power.

name: Elemental Affinity (Earth)
description: Mastery over earth-based spells and attacks.
upgrades: Control more advanced earth elements.

name: Time Compression
description: Speed up time for yourself or objects.
upgrades: Control over time compression and reversal.

name: Lycanthropy
description: Transform into a powerful wolf or wolf-like creature.
upgrades: Control other wolf forms and retain human consciousness.

name: Sound Manipulation
description: Control over sound waves for various effects.
upgrades: Manipulate sound to deceive or attack.

name: Dimensional Sealing
description: Seal or unseal portals to other dimensions.
upgrades: Control over dimensional locks and barriers.

name: Feline Agility
description: Gain agility, balance, and reflexes of a cat.
upgrades: Enhanced night vision and predatory instincts.

name: Mystic Warding
description: Create protective barriers against magic.
upgrades: Reinforce wards and create mobile shields.

name: Dimensional Cloning
description: Create duplicates of yourself in parallel dimensions.
upgrades: Control over clone actions and coordination.

name: Cryomancy
description: Mastery over ice-based spells and attacks.
upgrades: Control more advanced ice elements.

name: Elemental Affinity (Wind)
description: Mastery over wind-based spells and attacks.
upgrades: Control more advanced wind elements.

name: Sword of Darkness
description: Summon a dark, malevolent sword with cursed powers.
upgrades: Inflict more potent curses and amplify the sword's darkness.

name: Emotion Manipulation
description: Influence and control the emotions of others.
upgrades: Manipulate complex emotions and control larger groups.

name: Magma Manipulation
description: Control over molten rock for offense and defense.
upgrades: Manipulate hotter magma and create volcanic eruptions.

name: Hive Mind Connection
description: Communicate and coordinate with a network of allies.
upgrades: Expand the network and share skills and knowledge.

name: Spectral Form
description: Shift into a ghostly, intangible form.
upgrades: Phase through objects and become invisible.

name: Bardic Inspiration
description: Inspire others with music and poetry.
upgrades: Boost morale and enhance creative abilities.

name: Reality Warping
description: Bend the laws of reality to your will.
upgrades: Create alternate realities and shape existence.

name: Soul Fusion
description: Merge your soul with another being.
upgrades: Merge with more powerful entities and gain their abilities.

name: Gravity Manipulation
description: Control over gravitational forces.
upgrades: Alter gravity's strength and direction.

name: Beast Taming
description: Tame and command mythical beasts.
upgrades: Control larger and more powerful creatures.
downsides: Requires a deep bond with each beast.

name: Memory Manipulation
description: Edit, erase, or implant memories in others.
upgrades: Control over complex memory alterations.

name: Psychic Vision
description: Gain glimpses of the future and insights into others' thoughts.
upgrades: Increased accuracy and vision of distant events.

name: Temporal Stasis
description: Freeze time in a localized area.
upgrades: Extend the duration and affect larger areas.

name: Elemental Affinity (Lightning)
description: Mastery over lightning-based spells and attacks.
upgrades: Control more advanced lightning elements.

name: Sword of Wind
description: Summon a blade infused with the power of the wind.
upgrades: Create tornadoes and control the winds.

name: Aether Manipulation
description: Control the ethereal substance of the universe.
upgrades: Shape and manipulate reality on a cosmic scale.
downsides: Strain on the user's mind and body.

name: Living Armor
description: Armor that can grow, adapt, and self-repair.
upgrades: Enhance defensive capabilities and integrate weapon systems.

name: Illusionary Clone
description: Create illusionary duplicates to confuse enemies.
upgrades: More convincing and versatile illusions.

name: Cursed Bloodline
description: Inherited curse with unique abilities.
upgrades: Unlock latent curse powers and resistances.

name: Soul Reaver
description: Weapon that absorbs the souls of those it slays.
upgrades: Gain new abilities and power from absorbed souls.

name: Space Manipulation
description: Control over the fabric of space for teleportation and manipulation.
upgrades: Teleport to distant galaxies and create wormholes.

name: Dreamscape Mastery
description: Manipulate and reshape dreamscapes.
upgrades: Create dream constructs and affect reality through dreams.

name: Elemental Affinity (Darkness)
description: Mastery over darkness-based spells and attacks.
upgrades: Control more advanced dark elements.

name: Sentient Weaponry
description: Bond with a weapon that can communicate and strategize.
upgrades: Develop unique combat tactics with the weapon.

name: Chaos Magic
description: Unpredictable magic with random effects.
upgrades: Control over chaos magic and reduce randomness.

name: Elemental Affinity (Light)
description: Mastery over light-based spells and attacks.
upgrades: Control more advanced light elements.

name: Gravity Manipulation
description: Control over gravitational forces.
upgrades: Alter gravity's strength and direction.

description: Tame and command mythical beasts.
upgrades: Control larger and more powerful creatures.
downsides: Requires a deep bond with each beast.
